name: Texty Notepad Text Document
summary: Learn about .TEXTY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Texty Notepad is designed to be a straightforward alternative to other text editors and word processors in Windows, allowing users to create basic documents. For example, users can create school notes, manuscripts, or step-by-step instructions with Texty Notepad and save them as TXTY files. Additionally, the text editor offers several basic features, including Dark Mode and the ability to save documents as plain text (.txt) files.

description: A TXTY file is a text document created by Texty Notepad, a simple text editor for Windows. It contains plain text similar to a standard .TXT file but bears the .txty file extension to denote its association with Texty Notepad.

instructions: You can open TXTY files with Texty Notepad in Windows. Since the file stores plain text, you can also open it with any text editor and most popular web browsers. For example, Microsoft Notepad (Windows) and Apple TextEdit (macOS) can open TXTY files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .texty file in Texty Notepad
images.caption: TEXTY file open in Texty Notepad
